sentences.sentence: Diphenyl thiourea is an important intermediate of medicine and dyestuff.
sentences.translation: 二苯硫脲是重要的医药和染料的中间体。

sentences.sentence: Some samples of sodium bisulfite caused part of the diphenyl-acetic acid to dissolve.
sentences.translation: 一些样品的亚硫酸氢钠引起的一部分，二苯基乙酸解散。

sentences.sentence: Methods of synthesizing diphenyl carbonate included transesterification, urea and carbon disulfide.
sentences.translation: 其合成方法主要有酯交换法、尿素法和二硫化碳法等。
